Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants
    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants
    This class is in charge of displaying the board on the console and adding the marks that the players put on the board. It will also be in charge of checking for a winner or if the board is full.
    Since:
    January 31, 2019
